metadata.title: CVE-2023-46445 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in AsyncSSH before 2.14.1 allows attackers to control theextension info message (RFC 8308) via a man-in-the-middle attack, aka a"Rogue Extension Negotiation."

criterions.comment: python-asyncssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
